title: Be There
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Be There par Vacations
On the outside, looking in
I want to be there
I feel so close, but I'm so far
I can only stare

I'm fading away
I'm fading away

I don't mind
Home is where I would rather be
But still I want to be there
Just you and me

I'm fading away
I'm fading away
